game.name: Express No. 6
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Thirty minutes to New Year. You’re a train passenger. Something awful is unfolding- stop the train and survive. Look through the camera- it reveals the truth.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Thirty minutes to New Year. You’re a train passenger. Something awful is unfolding- stop the train and survive. Look through the camera- it reveals the truth.

reviewHighlights.text: 재밌었더염 소리 한번을 안질렀더염 공겜 애기 난이도? ^ㅁ^/!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
